otherFeatureRow1Col1Content: Add or select from recommended categories that match characteristics of products.

otherFeatureRow3Col2Content: Scan barcodes with an in-app camera to immediately view inventory status.

otherFeatureRow3Col4Content: Improve the decision-making process with visualization of stock-level data.
otherFeatureRow3Col5Content: Analyze the performance of inventory with various analytics tools.
